summary: The code uses FFmpeg to extract segments from the "edm_super_summit.m4a" audio file, saving them as "best_edm_split.mp3" and "best_edm_split2.mp3". The -ss option specifies the start time and -to the end time for each segment.

details.comment: The code uses FFmpeg to extract segments from the "edm_super_summit.m4a" audio file, saving them as "best_edm_split.mp3" and "best_edm_split2.mp3". The -ss option specifies the start time and -to the end time for each segment.
details.content:
# ffmpeg -y -i edm_super_summit.m4a -ss 00:00:50 -to 00:01:05 best_edm_split.mp3
ffmpeg -y -i edm_super_summit.m4a -ss 00:01:38 -to 00:01:49 best_edm_split2.mp3
